name: play
description: Finds and plays songs, artists, albums, playlists, or podcasts on a media provider.

query.description: A non-empty string specifying the content the user wants to play. This value is required even for generic `intent_type` values.

intent_type.description: Specifies the type of content to play. It must be one of the following values: "ALBUM", "ARTIST", "GENERIC_MUSIC", "GENERIC_PODCAST", "GENERIC_MUSIC_NEW", "GENERIC_SOMETHING_ELSE", "LIKED_SONGS", "PERSONAL_PLAYLIST", "PODCAST_EPISODE", "PODCAST_SHOW", "PUBLIC_PLAYLIST", or "TRACK".

filtering_type.description: The content type used for filtering. Must be one of the following: `ALBUM`, `PLAYLIST`, or `TRACK`.

name: search
description: Searches a media provider for content such as songs, artists, albums, playlists, or podcasts.

query.description: The search query for the desired content. This must be a non-empty string, even for generic search types.

intent_type.description: Specifies the type of content to search for. Must be one of the following values: "ALBUM", "ARTIST", "GENERIC_MUSIC", "GENERIC_PODCAST", "GENERIC_MUSIC_NEW", "GENERIC_SOMETHING_ELSE", "LIKED_SONGS", "PERSONAL_PLAYLIST", "PODCAST_EPISODE", "PODCAST_SHOW", "PUBLIC_PLAYLIST", or "TRACK".

filtering_type.description: The content type to filter search results by. Must be one of the following: "ALBUM", "PLAYLIST", or "TRACK".
